20101229065916.000|20101229065919.000|CC1|    the main water supply?      
20101229065919.000|20101229065919.000|CC1|    You do realize this is      
20101229065919.000|20101229065922.000|CC1|    just an exercise, right?    
20101229065922.000|20101229065922.000|CC1|            - I do now.         
20101229065922.000|20101229065924.000|CC1|            - Moving on.
